attributes.action: Add 'FREE SCHOOL MEALS during the school holidays' to the Education Act 1996
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament is the only House that is able to make these changes. Furthemore, all kids should be provided free school meals during the school holidays, as there are families that do not get enough to live off and are only able to pay their bills and that is because of the system and the government.

Kids should never go hungry and the government should have a heart and just think of kids that are going hungry and unable to sleep because of this.
attributes.background: Parliament needs to make changes and amend the Education Act 1996 to make it law that all kids from year 1 to year 11 who are unable to eat be provided hot meals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Fund free school meals over school holidays until April 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555727

Provide the free school meal entitlement throughout the year: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555723

End child food poverty – no child should be going hungry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554276
